name: SmartForms
description: SmartForms is an online form development and hosting service that government agencies can use to make developing, completing and processing forms easier, faster and more convenient.

widgets.name: Monthly transactions
widgets.definition: This shows the number of transactions per month.

widgets.name: Form and client changes
widgets.definition: This shows the number of form changes requested by agency.

widgets.name: SmartForms clients
widgets.definition: This shows the number of SmartForms clients by level of government.
